The final placement (1st–8th) the compos: A colocação final (1º–8º) que a composição atinge em média.

Each bar represents a final placement (1: Cada barra representa uma colocação final (1º–8º) e com que frequência a composição termina um jogo naquela colocação.
This is an approximation of what the boa: Essa é uma aproximação de como a formação no final de um jogo com essa composição normalmente se parece.

A perfect game with {comp} is a game whe: Um jogo perfeito com {comp} é um jogo onde o jogador não perdeu uma única rodada de combate e jogou com {comp} de forma consistente do turno 7 em diante. Vença um jogo perfeito nestas condições com um MMR alto usando o Hearthstone Deck Tracker para ser incluído nesta lista. Esta lista pode levar várias horas para ser atualizada.
Percent of the time this hero is picked: Porcentagem de vezes em que este herói é escolhido no início de um jogo, quando apresentado como opção.
The final placement this hero achieves o: A colocação final que este herói atinge em média. Menor é melhor.
Each bar represents a final placement fr: Cada barra representa uma colocação final do 1° até o 8° e quantas vezes este herói terminou um jogo naquela colocação.
The difference in average final placemen: A diferença na colocação final média (1º–8º) entre jogadores que jogam a composição com este herói e jogadores que jogam uma composição diferente com este herói.
Percent of the time this hero plays the: Porcentagem de vezes que este herói joga com a composição.
Each bar represents a final placement (1: Cada barra representa uma colocação final (1º–8º) e com que frequência a composição termina um jogo naquela colocação quando jogada com este herói.

Each bar represents a final placement (1: Each bar represents a final placement (1st–8th) and how the hero finishes a game at that placement.
Popularity of all minions in the composi: Popularity of all minions in the compositon over the course of a game
<0>The difference in final placement (1s: <0>The difference in final placement (1st–8th) between players who played a plain copy of the minion and players who did not.</0><1>For example, if</1><2>- Players who play a copy place 4th</2><3>- Players who do not play it place 5th</3><4>It would mean playing it improves the final placement by 1, and therefore has a Play Impact of '+1'.</4>

<0>The difference in final placement (1st–8th) between players who played a golden copy of the minion and players who did not.</0><1>For example, if</1><2>- Players who play a copy place 4th</2><3>- Players who do not play it place 5th</3><4>It would mean playing it improves the final placement by 1, and therefore has a Play Impact of '+1'.</4>

Percent of the time combat is won, when: Percent of the time combat is won, when at least one golden copy of the minion is on the board. Ties are excluded.
Percent of the time at least one golden: Percent of the time at least one golden copy of the minion is on the board during combat.

Colocar um lacaio nesse local pode produzir resultados variados.</1>

<0>The difference in final placement (1s: <0>The difference in final placement (1st–8th) between players who played a copy of {minionName} on a given turn and players who did not.</0><1>For example, if</1><2>- Players who play {minionName} place 4th</2><3>- Players who do not play it place 5th</3><4>It would mean playing it improves the final placement by 1, and therefore has a Play Impact of '+1'.</4>
If the play impact goes negative, it mig: If the play impact goes negative, it might be too late to play {minionName}
If the Combat Winrate goes negative, it: If the Combat Winrate goes negative, it might be time to sell {minionName}
Percent of the time combat is won, when: Percent of the time combat is won, when at least one copy of {minionName} is on the board. Ties are excluded.

Percent of the time {minionName} is purc: Percent of the time {minionName} is purchased when offered by Bob, while players have zero, one, or two copies on the board.
When the discover rate is high, consider: When the discover rate is high, consider prioritizing this minion if it's offered in a Triple Reward.
Percent of the time players pick {minion: Percent of the time players pick {minionName}, when offered via Discover. Usually this is from a Triple Reward, but it also might be from a Primalfin Scout, Alexstraza's Hero Power, or any other Discover mechanic.
The popularity drops when players are se: The popularity drops when players are selling or tripling {minionName}
Percent of the time at least one copy of: Percent of the time at least one copy of {minionName} is on the board during combat.
If your {minionName} is smaller, conside: If your {minionName} is smaller, consider buffing it more
Median {minionName} stats over the cours: Median {minionName} stats over the course of a game
{minionName} does not have enough data i: {minionName} does not have enough data in the selected Time Frame and MMR Range

Want to know what the best composition i: Want to know what the best composition is in Battlegrounds? How about the best minion to buy on turn 8 when you're playing Demons? Subscribe to Tier7 to get unlimited access to our Battlegrounds stats so you can learn all that and more!
Gain access to the best composition for: Gain access to the best composition for each hero on the hero tier list, as well as a full statistical breakdown of how any given hero is currently performing in the meta on dedicated hero pages.

Learn how to pilot each minion in any co: Learn how to pilot each minion in any composition it's commonly seen in. Find the best positioning, when to sell or buy, if buying the gold version is truly worth it and much more.
Easily sort minions by tier, turn, compo: Easily sort minions by tier, turn, composition, winrate and more to find the perfect choice.
Compare a minion's placement impact agai: Compare a minion's placement impact against it's popularity among other players to find the best position.
See exactly how a minion does in combat: See exactly how a minion does in combat over the course of a game to know if it might be time to sell.
Discover how each composition is perform: Discover how each composition is performing in the current meta, and how popular it is among other players. Compare each key minion for the composition and browse perfect games at top MMR to see how the best are piloting it.
Get an overview of how compositions are: Get an overview of how compositions are currently performing, and even see the typical final board for each one.
Choose the minions you want to compare a: Choose the minions you want to compare and see how they perform over the course of a game.
Check out perfect games played by the to: Check out perfect games played by the top Battlegrounds players to see how their board progressed over the course of a game.
